definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: 24But the word of God continued to increase and spread.
sentences.chinese: 神的道日见兴旺，越发广传。

sentences.english: When public journalism transpires and proliferates, how do you receive news?
sentences.chinese: 公民新闻显身广传，你如何看待新消息？

sentences.english: But the word of God continued to increase and spread.
sentences.chinese: 神的道日见兴旺，越发广传。

sentences.english: These insightful suggestions are the key to effective evangelism around the world.
sentences.chinese: 这些明智的建议，正是广传福音的关键。

sentences.english: They will celebrate your abundant kindness, and rejoice in singing of your justice.
sentences.chinese: 广传你无穷慈爱的记念，欢呼歌唱你的公义无限。

definition: to lecture on doctrine/to expound the wisdom of ancient sages/to preach/a sermon
variant of 弘揚|弘扬[hong2 yang2]
to pass on doctrines from master to disciple (Buddhism)
